channel.title: Projekt DragonzPkzScape Remix V6 [Recruiting] A Massive Project To Be
channel.description:
[center][b]The Projekt DragonzPkzScape Remix V6 Thread[/b]
Welcome To The Projekt DragonzPkzScape Remix V6 Thread The Devolpment Team Of The DragonzPkzScape Remix Server
Category Section [color=blue]Chapter 1: Information Chapter 2: FAQ Chapter 3: Jobs To Be Done Chapter 4: Updates Chapter 5: Pictures Chapter 6: Credits Chapter 7: Site Info
Chapter: 1 INFORMATION
[color=navy]Server Base: EvilScape V2 Client.java Size: 5.5MB Handlers: Yes Skillcapes: Yes (Silabs) Own Minigames: Yes Quests Like RuneScape: Yes 100% All Combat Skills: Yes Defiently Client: No SilabSoft Only Starting Kit: Black Cavlier,Rune Platebody,Dragon Platelegs,Rune Defender,Dragon Boots,Obby Cape,Rune Longsword
Chapter 2 FAQ
NO FAQ YET
Chapter 3 JOBS TO BE DONE
Ill Do This CHAPTER Later
Chapter 4 UPDATES
[code]1. New Starting Kit 2. Now Type ::rules Before Moving 3. Added A Sweetie Shop[/code]
Chapter 5 PICTURES
Starting Kit [IMG]http://i23.tinypic.com/2lwp3ed.png[/img] Type ::rules Be4 Moving [IMG]http://i22.tinypic.com/apcrkm.png[/img] Sweetie Shop [IMG]http://i24.tinypic.com/15dw7xy.png[/img]
Mods Dont Delete This Please
